title: Improve “Why I Love You” modal text readability after opening

requirements.text: Increase the readability of the text shown inside the “Why I Love You” modal (the window that appears after clicking “Why I Love You ❤️”) by adding/strengthening a background behind the appearing text so the lines are clearly readable on both mobile and desktop, without changing the modal’s existing copy.

quotes: after clicking why i love you. the next window appera i cannt read that apperared text.

acceptanceCriteria: When the user clicks “Why I Love You ❤️”, the modal content text is clearly readable with a high-contrast background treatment behind it (e.g., stronger frosted panel or a dedicated darker/translucent text panel).
The sequential fade-in behavior of the 5 lines remains intact; readability improvements apply to lines as they appear.
On small mobile screens, no modal text overlaps other UI elements; if content exceeds viewport height, the modal body remains scrollable and usable.
Modal layering is correct (modal and its background overlay sit above the proposal screen), and taps/clicks outside the modal still close it while clicks inside do not.

constraints: Use English for any new user-facing UI text (do not change existing provided story copy).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose existing components instead.
Keep the app mobile-first and ensure changes respect prefers-reduced-motion where applicable.
nonGoals: Do not change the story flow, stage ordering, or timing outside of the “Why I Love You” modal.
Do not add new backend functionality (backend is currently unused).
Do not change the existing love line copy content.
